definition: Converting code from one programming language to another while preserving functionality

positive_examples: The AI translated the Python script to idiomatic Rust with proper error handling.
Code translation converted the Java class to TypeScript, adapting to language conventions.
The assistant transpiled the legacy Perl code to modern Python 3.
Code translation ported the algorithm from C++ to Go, using goroutines appropriately.
training_hints.disambiguation: Functional conversion between programming languages with idiomatic adaptation
